Detailed Description

Functions

int adc_open (port_t port)
 
int adc_close (port_t port)
 This functions closes the specified ADC port.
 
int adc_getattr (port_t port, adc_attr_t *attr)
 This function gets the ADC attributes from the specified ADC port.
 
int adc_setattr (port_t port, const adc_attr_t *attr)
 This function sets the ADC attributes for port.
 
int adc_read (port_t port, int chan, void *buf, int nbyte)
 Reads consecutive samples from the ADC port.
 

Function Documentation

int adc_open ( port_t  port)

This function opens the specified ADC port (e.g. /dev/adc0).
